item.description:
Dear Fellow Members of our Secular Community:

 
We are in the process of uniting all the local atheist / agnostic / secular humanist / freethinker groups in CT for the purpose of forming a more unified voice and presence in our community as well as our state legislature. We would like to extend our warmest invitation out to you to join us in a meet and greet dinner where we will take our first step in creating a secular unity in our state.  Please join us for a meet and greet networking dinner where we will get to know one another, address secular issues and discuss what we'd like to accomplish with the power of a unified group.

PLEASE JOIN US AT THE QUARRY RIDGE GOLF COURSE RESTAURANT 
9A Rose Hill Road, Portland, CT 06480 • Friday, September 23, 2011 @ 6:00pm 
Buffet dinner (includes hor’dourves, main course, salads, sides, soft drinks, coffee/tea & dessert) will be $25 per person, Open cash bar will be also available

*** David Niose (President of American Humanist Association) will be our special guest & speaker for the evening.  Please help us make him feel as welcome as we possibly can.  Thank you.

 

THIS IS THE OFFICIAL RSVP LINK:

http://snaplink.org/SCCT

If you haven't already, please register through that website.  An accurate head count will help the establishment accomodate us better - it will also help make for a smoother and classier night.  Thanks!

If you know of other secular group, please help spread the word of this State Wide Secular Uniting Effort :) RSVP soon. Thanks!

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Secular CT Meet & Greet
